scripts.cy:run: npx cypress run  --env allure=true && rm -rf allure-results
scripts.run:test: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/test-chrome.cy.js' --browser chrome && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/test-electron.cy.js' --browser electron --env allure=true
scripts.run:test:dashboard: npx cypress run --record --key 7ee9c75c-6bec-4221-8ed6-c8dfb2679006 --spec 'cypress/e2e/Chrome/test-chrome.cy.js' --browser chrome && npx cypress run --record --key 7ee9c75c-6bec-4221-8ed6-c8dfb2679006 --spec 'cypress/e2e/Electron/test-electron.cy.js' --browser electron
scripts.cy:nokey:parallel: npm run cy:run:chrome -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run:electron -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:parallel: concurrently "npm run cy:run:chrome -- --browser chrome --group chrome" "npm run cy:run:electron -- --browser electron --group electron"
